description: AbuseIPDB v2 API integration for IP reputation and abuse report lookups

rate_limit.note: Free tier. Subscriber plans offer higher limits.

check_ip.description: Check an IP address against the AbuseIPDB database

ipAddress.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address to check

maxAgeInDays.description: Only return reports from the last N days (1-365)

verbose.description: Include individual report details in response

response_fields.data.abuseConfidenceScore: Confidence score 0-100 that IP is abusive
response_fields.data.lastReportedAt: ISO timestamp of most recent report
response_fields.data.isTor: Whether the IP is a known Tor exit node
response_fields.data.isWhitelisted: Whether IP is on the AbuseIPDB whitelist

get_blacklist.description: Download list of IPs with confidence score >= threshold
